thread.title: News Wrap: Assad makes surprise visit to Russia PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: News Wrap: Assad makes surprise visit to Russia | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: News Wrap: Assad makes surprise visit to Russia PBS NewsHour
text: In our news wrap Wednesday, Syrian President Bashar al-Assad held talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Moscow -- his first known trip abroad since the Syrian civil war began in 2011. Also, Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu drew criticism for linking the Holocaust to a Palestinian leader from World War II.
